data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Seal Rock, Oregon, USA (SR15)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Seal Rock, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway XTI Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2001-08-01. The instrument depth was 014 meters, in an overall water depth of 15 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
